name: Sort Em All
description:
Sort Em All -- A classic and addictive water sort tube puzzle. Different from other glass water sort and merge games, Sort Em All requires a stronger logic. Try it out now!


Game Goal:
There are several glasses with colorful water. The goal is to tap the glasses and merge the same colored water in the same glasses.


How To Play:
-- Tap any glasses and pour the water to merge.
-- Be careful. Each glass can contain 4 colors only once.
-- Get stuck? Use tools! You can either restart the level or add another glass.
You can also use hints!


Feature:
-- Unlock unique glass shapes and backgrounds.
-- Easy enough to get started but hard to master.
-- No time pressure! Just relax and take your time.
